page.title: 19Home life.
page.content: I like to play with my brothers.I go to feed my rabbit.I go to play with Steven and Royston. I go home for tea and I go to bed. In the morning I wash the dishes. I help to feed Kitty. I feed Donna with baby food. Sometimes I help my mummy to wash and dust. I make my cats egg and I give him fresh water to drink. My pet is a cat. I comb him every day. Sometimes I comb him two times a day. His name is Oscar. I do the gardening by watering the tomato plants and putting seeds in because they turn in to lovely flowers. I like helping mummy getting the table laid because mummy always says get the knives and forks out and get the salt and pepper out.Daddy says pepper makes you sneeze.
